svg.text:
title: "Week in Ethereum News
June 1, 2024" date: "2024-06-01"
Eth News and Links
PeerDAS included in Pectra upgrade but with separate activation epoch, proposal to
extend ENS to Layer 2 & Biden vetos congressional disapproval of SEC SAB 121
All core devs
* All core devs – consensus (ACDC) #134 . Notes from Christine Kim : Pectra (Prague +
Electra) upgrade : Discussion on when/what to ship : Options included splitting Pectra
( Lodestar proposal ) or replacing EIPs with PeerDAS EIP7594 PeerDAS: included in
Pectra but with separate activation epoch to allow moving to a later upgrade if needed
Blob size increase : no decision ( blob target of 3 reached this week) EIP7688 change
SSZ data to StableContainer : no decision, discuss at next ACDC, need more
implementation progress
All core devs – consensus (ACDC) #134 . Notes from Christine Kim :
* Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade : Discussion on when/what to ship : Options
included splitting Pectra ( Lodestar proposal ) or replacing EIPs with PeerDAS EIP7594
PeerDAS: included in Pectra but with separate activation epoch to allow moving to a
later upgrade if needed Blob size increase : no decision ( blob target of 3 reached
this week) EIP7688 change SSZ data to StableContainer : no decision, discuss at next
ACDC, need more implementation progress
* Discussion on when/what to ship : Options included splitting Pectra ( Lodestar
proposal ) or replacing EIPs with PeerDAS EIP7594 PeerDAS: included in Pectra but with
separate activation epoch to allow moving to a later upgrade if needed Blob size
increase : no decision ( blob target of 3 reached this week) EIP7688 change SSZ data to
StableContainer : no decision, discuss at next ACDC, need more implementation progress
* Options included splitting Pectra ( Lodestar proposal ) or replacing EIPs with
PeerDAS
Options included splitting Pectra ( Lodestar proposal ) or replacing EIPs with PeerDAS
* EIP7594 PeerDAS: included in Pectra but with separate activation epoch to allow
moving to a later upgrade if needed
EIP7594 PeerDAS: included in Pectra but with separate activation epoch to allow moving
to a later upgrade if needed
* Blob size increase : no decision ( blob target of 3 reached this week)
Blob size increase : no decision ( blob target of 3 reached this week)
* EIP7688 change SSZ data to StableContainer : no decision, discuss at next ACDC, need
more implementation progress
EIP7688 change SSZ data to StableContainer : no decision, discuss at next ACDC, need
* Tim Beiko: process improvement proposals for All Core Devs, network upgrades & Eth
Magicians, discuss at next ACDE
Tim Beiko: process improvement proposals for All Core Devs, network upgrades & Eth
Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade
* Future of EOA/AA breakout #3 : EIP7702 refinements to be merged, next breakout June 5
to discuss potential changes, ERC-standardized proxy contract & wallet best practices
Osaka + F starname upgrade
* Verkle progress , best case ~2025
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
* 🚨 Lido increased to 29% , too close to 33.3% threshold
🚨 Lido increased to 29% , too close to 33.3% threshold
* Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth ~55% majority
Consensus layer: Prysm 38% Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
* Execution layer: Geth ~55% majority
Execution layer: Geth ~55% majority
* Consensus layer: Prysm 38%
Consensus layer: Prysm 38%
* Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
* Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America &
Europe
Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America & Europe
Layer 1
* Péter Szilágyi: full node space requirements , 800GB for blocks & receipts + 250GB
for active state & Geth snapshots
Péter Szilágyi: full node space requirements , 800GB for blocks & receipts + 250GB for
active state & Geth snapshots
* Proposed issuance reduction FAQ
Proposed issuance reduction FAQ
* Blob impact on reorgs , increasing by 2.3 blobs increases reorg probability to 0.59%
Blob impact on reorgs , increasing by 2.3 blobs increases reorg probability to 0.59%
* Gossipsup performance in P2P, average effectiveness ratio is more than 1:10 across
topics
Gossipsup performance in P2P, average effectiveness ratio is more than 1:10 across
* Terence: delayed execution , benefit of pipelining consensus & execution in ePBS
Terence: delayed execution , benefit of pipelining consensus & execution in ePBS
Client Releases
* Execution layer: Besu v24.5.2 : default Bonsai storage mode to use code storage by
code hash & use flat db and new RPC methods to get/set vanity extra data in a built
block
* Besu v24.5.2 : default Bonsai storage mode to use code storage by code hash & use
flat db and new RPC methods to get/set vanity extra data in a built block
For Stakers
* Obol staking mastery program to develop educational leaders
Layer 2
* Base gas target increased to 7.5 Mgas/s
Base gas target increased to 7.5 Mgas/s
* OP Stack custom gas token , beta
OP Stack custom gas token , beta
* Taiko live, plans to become optimistic-zk hybrid based rollup
Taiko live, plans to become optimistic-zk hybrid based rollup
* L2BEAT: Layer 3 projects TVL
L2BEAT: Layer 3 projects TVL
* Ed Felten: selling MEV separately can give more revenue than shared MEV auctions
Ed Felten: selling MEV separately can give more revenue than shared MEV auctions
* Vitalik: Layer 2s as cultural extensions of Ethereum
Vitalik: Layer 2s as cultural extensions of Ethereum
EIPs/Standards
* EIPs: EIP7716 : Anti-correlation attestation penalties
EIPs:
* EIP7716 : Anti-correlation attestation penalties
* ERCs (application layer): ERC7717 : Deterministic AA wallet
ERCs (application layer):
* ERC7717 : Deterministic AA wallet
Stuff for developers
* Compiler fingerprinting using bytecode-specific heuristics
Compiler fingerprinting using bytecode-specific heuristics
* Runtime Verification Simbolik : Solidity debugger VS Code extension, private beta
Runtime Verification Simbolik : Solidity debugger VS Code extension, private beta
* 0xngmi Etherscan verification : verify an already verified contract on another chain
0xngmi Etherscan verification : verify an already verified contract on another chain
* RareSkills: guide to ABI encoding for function calls
RareSkills: guide to ABI encoding for function calls
* Ape v0.8.0 (Python contract framework): major refactor
Ape v0.8.0 (Python contract framework): major refactor
* Tevm (TypeScript EVM toolkit): in browser devnet & Solidity scripting
Tevm (TypeScript EVM toolkit): in browser devnet & Solidity scripting
* TracEVM : track values & addresses of slots in a contract
TracEVM : track values & addresses of slots in a contract
* R55 : Rust contract compiled to RISCV bytecode run inside an execution client
R55 : Rust contract compiled to RISCV bytecode run inside an execution client
* CTFs: OpenZeppelin Ethernaut new level: Stake
CTFs:
* OpenZeppelin Ethernaut new level: Stake
* Red Guild: devcontainers , preconfigured dev sandbox in a Docker container
Red Guild: devcontainers , preconfigured dev sandbox in a Docker container
Security
* Normie token exploit on Base, via transfer function check for balance matching team
wallet
Ecosystem
* ETHBerlin hackathon winners
ETHBerlin hackathon winners
* Devcon supporter program to assist impact teams with free tickets
Devcon supporter program to assist impact teams with free tickets
Job Listings
* Alchemy - Wallet Services: Engineering Manager and Full-Stack Engineer
Alchemy - Wallet Services: Engineering Manager and Full-Stack Engineer
* ChainSafe: Head of Protocol Engineering , DevRel - Sygma and more jobs
ChainSafe: Head of Protocol Engineering , DevRel - Sygma and more jobs
* Privacy and Scaling Explorations: ZK Circuits Engineer
Privacy and Scaling Explorations: ZK Circuits Engineer
Job listings: $600 for 4 issues (75 char limit). Pay using 3cities. Questions?
abcoathup at-gmail
Onchain stats
* Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 2.1 to 75.6 gwei, with 10.4 gwei average Zero net
issuance currently at 23.3 gwei 9k ETH net issuance this week
Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 2.1 to 75.6 gwei, with 10.4 gwei average
* Zero net issuance currently at 23.3 gwei
Zero net issuance currently at 23.3 gwei
* 9k ETH net issuance this week
9k ETH net issuance this week
* ETHUSD : $3,712 - $3,959, currently $3,758
ETHUSD : $3,712 - $3,959, currently $3,758
* ETHBTC : currently 0.056 (Flippening at ~0.16)
ETHBTC : currently 0.056 (Flippening at ~0.16)
Notable at app layer
* ENS Labs ENSv2 proposal to extend to Layer 2 (either select an L2 or create their
own)
ENS Labs ENSv2 proposal to extend to Layer 2 (either select an L2 or create their own)
* Uniswap Foundation postpone fee reward vote
Uniswap Foundation postpone fee reward vote
* MEV scanner : reports amount of MEV for an address via website, X/Telegram/Discord
bot
MEV scanner : reports amount of MEV for an address via website, X/Telegram/Discord bot
Regulation/business/tokens
* Biden vetos congressional disapproval of SEC Staff Accounting Bulletin 121 that
precluded banks offering crypto custody Democrats still doing anti crypto actions ,
despite recent campaign outreach
Biden vetos congressional disapproval of SEC Staff Accounting Bulletin 121 that
precluded banks offering crypto custody
* Democrats still doing anti crypto actions , despite recent campaign outreach
* SEC ordered to pay $1.8M in legal expenses for “bad faith” crypto lawsuit
SEC ordered to pay $1.8M in legal expenses for “bad faith” crypto lawsuit
* US Treasury NFT risk assessment , rarely used for terrorist financing, susceptible to
use in fraud/scams & being stolen
US Treasury NFT risk assessment , rarely used for terrorist financing, susceptible to
* SEC Commissioner Peirce proposes opening UK sandbox to US
SEC Commissioner Peirce proposes opening UK sandbox to US
* Former FTX executive Ryan Salame sentenced to 7.5 years
Former FTX executive Ryan Salame sentenced to 7.5 years
* Matter Labs (zkSync) applied for ZK trademark
Matter Labs (zkSync) applied for ZK trademark
General
* Vitalik: Bitcoin block size war reflections , embrace new tech or stagnate
Vitalik: Bitcoin block size war reflections , embrace new tech or stagnate
* SPDZ : colab notebook for generic MPC scheme split into preprocessing & online phases
SPDZ : colab notebook for generic MPC scheme split into preprocessing & online phases
* Length Extension Attacks : hash functions using Merkle–Damgård construction are
vulnerable
Length Extension Attacks : hash functions using Merkle–Damgård construction are
* Ticketmaster data breach via third-party cloud database provider
Ticketmaster data breach via third-party cloud database provider
* Reminder: Week in Ethereum News (ES) : Spanish translation of the newsletter
Reminder: Week in Ethereum News (ES) : Spanish translation of the newsletter
END OF SERVICE: plan to deprecate Week in Ethereum News
Editor: @abcoathup Follow @WeekinEthNews for the most clicked links Permalink:
https://weekinethereumnews.com/week-in-ethereum-news-june-1-2024
Upcoming Dates of Note
(new/changes in bold )
* Jun 14 – EF EIP4844 data challenge deadline
Jun 14 – EF EIP4844 data challenge deadline
* Jun 21-23 – ETHKyiv hackathon & conference
Jun 21-23 – ETHKyiv hackathon & conference
* Jul 8-11 – EthCC (Brussels) conference
Jul 8-11 – EthCC (Brussels) conference
* Jul 12-14 – ETHGlobal Brussels hackathon
Jul 12-14 – ETHGlobal Brussels hackathon
* Jul 29-30 – EDCON Tokyo conference
Jul 29-30 – EDCON Tokyo conference
* Aug 2-4 – Ethereum Argentina conference & hackathon
Aug 2-4 – Ethereum Argentina conference & hackathon
* Aug 15-17 – Ethereum Uruguay hackathon & conference
Aug 15-17 – Ethereum Uruguay hackathon & conference
* Aug 23-Sep 13 – ETHGlobal ETHOnline virtual hackathon
Aug 23-Sep 13 – ETHGlobal ETHOnline virtual hackathon
* Aug 23-26 – ETHTokyo hackathon & conference
Aug 23-26 – ETHTokyo hackathon & conference
* Aug 29-31 – ETHAccra hackathon
Aug 29-31 – ETHAccra hackathon
* Sep 5-8 – ETHWarsaw conference & hackathon
Sep 5-8 – ETHWarsaw conference & hackathon
* Sep 9-15 – ETHSafari (Kenya)
Sep 9-15 – ETHSafari (Kenya)
* Sep 12-14 – NapulETH (Napoli)
Sep 12-14 – NapulETH (Napoli)
* Sep 13-14 – Ethereum México
Sep 13-14 – Ethereum México
* Sep 20-22 – ETHGlobal Singapore hackathon
Sep 20-22 – ETHGlobal Singapore hackathon
* Sep 26-27 – ETHMilan conference
Sep 26-27 – ETHMilan conference
* Oct 4-6 – Ethereum Kuala Lumpur conference & hackathon
Oct 4-6 – Ethereum Kuala Lumpur conference & hackathon
* Oct 4-6 – ETHRome hackathon
Oct 4-6 – ETHRome hackathon
* Oct 17-19 – ETHSofia conference & hackathon
Oct 17-19 – ETHSofia conference & hackathon
* Oct 18-20 – ETHGlobal San Francisco hackathon
Oct 18-20 – ETHGlobal San Francisco hackathon
* Nov 12-15 – Devcon 7 - Southeast Asia (Bangkok)
Nov 12-15 – Devcon 7 - Southeast Asia (Bangkok)
* Nov 15-17 – ETHGlobal Bangkok hackathon
Nov 15-17 – ETHGlobal Bangkok hackathon
